data.text: @pablooito Hi There! We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. data.text: @paulamape Hi there! Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK
@ToderascuAndre4 Hi. To book an extra seat, you need to reserve an additional adult ticket with your last name and EXST (as for extra seat) in the name fields then contact us.
@ddddsxz Hi. You can bring less than 3 bags but they can't exceed 32 kg each.
@garyweb Hi. UK number is 09 057 070 000, 1.45 GBP/min.
